Name: Singapore Sling (Baker's Formula)
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Sling glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered lemon slice wheel and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry (sail).
STRAIN into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring soda.
Garnish with skewered lemon slice and cherry (sail).
Review: Lacks the citrus of other Singapore Slings but the strength of the gin and dilution cuts and so balances the sweetness of the liqueurs.
History: Singapore Sling history and other versions
